event.name: FP_COMP_OPS_EXE.X87
event.descp: Counts number of X87 uops executed.

event.name: UOPS_ISSUED.ANY
event.descp: Increments each cycle the # of Uops issued by the RAT to RS. Set Cmask = 1, Inv = 1, Any = 1 to count stalled cycles of this core.

event.name: BR_INST_RETIRED.ALL_BRANCHES
event.descp: Branch instructions at retirement. Note: Already in intel_events.xml

event.name: BR_INST_RETIRED.CONDITIONAL
event.descp: Counts the number of conditional branch instructions retired.

event.name: BR_MISP_RETIRED.ALL_BRANCHES
event.descp: Mispredicted branch instructions at retirement. Note: Already in intel_events.xml

event.name: MEM_UOPS_RETIRED.ALL
event.descp: Qualify any retired memory uops. Must combine with umask 01H, 02H, to produce counts.

event.name: MEM_UOPS_RETIRED.LOADS
event.descp: Qualify retired memory uops that are loads. Combine with umask 10H, 20H, 40H, 80H.

event.name: MEM_LOAD_UOPS_RETIRED.LLC_MISS
event.descp: Retired load uops whose data source is LLC miss
